means: 使腐蚀，侵蚀( corrode的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He warns that corruption is corroding Russia.
sentence.Network_cn: 他警告说腐败正在侵蚀俄罗斯。

sentence.Network_en: Suffering was easier to bear than the bitterness he felt corroding his spirit.
sentence.Network_cn: 相较于他感觉正在侵蚀他灵魂的痛苦而言，这种折磨倒更容易承受。

sentence.Network_en: That sour nature has started corroding those metal parts.
sentence.Network_cn: 那酸质已开始腐蚀那金属部件.

PerfectNetExp.abs: the method of using Epoxy resin coated bar is used for the construction of center column for thickener , which pre vents the reinforced bar in the foundation column from corroding .同时采用环氧树脂涂敷钢筋这一新技术解决浓缩池中心柱基础钢筋防腐问题。

list.abs: corroding electrode 腐蚀电极corroding metal 腐蚀金属corrodkote test 涂膏耐蚀试验
corroborative 进一步证实的corroded grain 被腐蚀颗粒corroded 侵蚀的
corrodibility 可腐蚀性corroding electrode 腐蚀电极corroding metal 腐蚀金属
non conventional machining 特种加工non corrodibility 耐蚀性non destructive test 非破坏试验

entry.def: If metal or stone corrodes, or is cor-roded, it is gradually destroyed by a chemical or by rust.

example.ex: He has devised a process for making gold wires which neither corrode nor oxidise...
example.tran: 他设计了一种能够避免腐蚀或氧化的金丝制作流程。

example.ex: Engineers found the structure had been corroded by moisture...
example.tran: 工程师们发现该建筑已经受潮腐蚀。

entry.def: To corrode something means to gradually make it worse or weaker.

example.ex: Suffering was easier to bear than the bitterness he felt corroding his spirit...
example.tran: 相较于他感觉正在侵蚀他灵魂的痛苦而言，这种折磨倒更容易承受。

example.ex: He warns that corruption is corroding Russia.
example.tran: 他警告说腐败正在侵蚀俄罗斯。

auth_sentence.content: But the doubt had arisen, corroding my belief.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the doubt had arisen, corroding my belief.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the doubt had arisen, corroding my belief.

auth_sentence.content: I am only covering up my bone-deep, life-corroding loneliness.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am only covering up my bone-deep, life-corroding loneliness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am only covering up my bone-deep, life-corroding loneliness.

auth_sentence.content: Some planes are simply derelicts corroding in barns or junkyards.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some planes are simply derelicts corroding in barns or junkyards.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some planes are simply derelicts corroding in barns or junkyards.
